text: Avu (ā jinn‌gaḷu) avaru (sulaimānaru) bayasidante avarigāgi, br̥hat kaṭṭaḍagaḷannū pratimegaḷannū, koḷagaḷantaha harivāṇagaḷannū sthiravāgiruva br̥hat pākapātregaḷannū nirmisi koḍuttiddavu. Dāvūdara santatigaḷē, nīvu kr̥tajñarāgi, satkarmagaḷannu māḍiri. Nanna dāsaralli kelavaru mātra kr̥tajñaru
